Preparation QC: library quality assessed using Bioanalyzer or Qubit
Source: Data was obtained from the GEO repository, project GSE185051. Data is available at: https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/geo/query/acc.cgi?acc=GSE185051
Alignment & Quantification: Reads aligned to hg38 using STAR v2.7.5a; gene counts generated using STAR –quantMode GeneCounts
